From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

J. K. Simmons
Allen Leech

Isabelle Anaya

CinematographyPietro VillaniEdited byEvan AhlgrenMusic byJoe SimmonsProductioncompanies
Rubber Tree Productions

Distributed byLionsgateRelease date
May 17, 2024 (2024-05-17)
CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
You Can't Run Forever (formerly titled The Woods)[1] is an upcoming American thriller film written by Carolyn Carpenter and Michelle Schumacher, directed by Schumacher and starring J. K. Simmons.[2]
The film is scheduled to be released in the United States on May 17, 2024.


Cast[edit]
J. K. Simmons as Wade
Allen Leech as Eddie
Fernanda Urrejola as Jenny
Isabelle Anaya as Miranda
Nathan Vincenti as Davis
Production[edit]
In September 2021, it was announced that Simmons, Leech, Urrejola and Anaya were cast in the film.[3]  It was also reported that same month that filming had occurred in Missoula, Montana.[4]
Filming wrapped in January 2023.[5]

Release[edit]
You Can't Run Forever is scheduled to be released in the United States on May 17, 2024.[6]
